fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player. You will create a clone of this player which you can control each night. A clone of a player will share all the same abilities, attributes, and statuses of the player on the night they were cloned, and you will learn this information upon cloning them. You cannot clone a player that already has a clone.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If a player targets a player with a clone, the clone will instead be targeted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose you.
